preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from VelocityDocumentTemplate where name = 'memberWelcomeEmail.vm'

insert.column:
Welcome to Business Reach Network! #parse("emailTemplateStyle.vm") #parse("emailHeader.vm")

Hi ${firstName} ${lastName},

Welcome to the Business Reach network. We help you manage and expand your partner network by offering partner collaboration, discovery and management. In order to setup your profile and get access to the platform provided by Business Reach please follow the following steps.

Complete Member Profile

Fill out your profile to increase the potential to be found and connected by going to Profile->Edit Member Profile menu. After entering profile data you press Update to save your changes.

Define Business Profile

Next step is to define your Business. You can either create a new one or associate yourself to an existing Business by going to Profile->Specify Business menu item. When you click the Associate button system will try to find whether there is an existing Business in the network. If found it will send a notification to the concerned member of the Business to approve your association with the Business. Otherwise system will prompt you to provide additional information about the new Business so that it can be created as part of Business Reach network.

Invite Partners

Once you have defined your Business you can invite your partners and employees in Business Reach network by going to Connect->Invite menu item.

Create Content Space

In order to distribute content to employees and partners you can create Content Workspaces by going to Collaborate->Content menu item.

Account Related Information

By default you Business Account created is Business Standard which allows you to invite partners and employees, create content space to distribute contents and among them. Other features such as partner program management, collaboration workspaces are available when you upgrade to Business Plus account.

#parse("emailFooter.vm")

insert.column:
Welcome to Business Reach Network! #parse("emailTemplateStyle.vm") #parse("emailHeader.vm")

Hi ${orgInviteeName},

${partnerWelcomeMessage}

Welcome to the Business Reach network. We help you manage and expand your partner network by offering partner collaboration tools, new partner discovery and partner management dashboards. In order to setup your profile and get access to the tools provided by Business Reach please follow the following steps.

Complete Member Profile

Fill out your profile to increase the potential to be found and connected by going to Profile->Edit Member Profile menu. After entering profile data you press Update to save your changes.

Complete Business Profile

Next step is to complete your Business.

Invite Partners

Once you have defined your Business you can invite your partners and employees in Business Reach network by going to Connect->Invite menu item.

Create Content Space

In order to distribute content to employees and partners you can create Content Workspaces by going to Collaborate->Content menu item.

Account Related Information

By default you Business Account created is Business Standard which allows you to invite partners and employees, create content space to distribute contents and among them. Other features such as partner program management, collaboration workspaces are available when you upgrade to Business Plus account.

#parse("emailFooter.vm")
